sectionOne.title: Meet Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Mr. Kaleem Basha, an accomplished professional with over 20 years of experience in Oracle ERP and Financial Management systems, brings deep industry expertise and global implementation knowledge to the classroom. As a certified Oracle and PMP trainer, Kaleem combines technical proficiency with strategic insight, helping students bridge the gap between theoretical learning and real-world applications. Driven by a passion for mentorship and professional development, he is dedicated to shaping future-ready finance professionals. His vision is to produce industry-standard Oracle Fusion Financials consultants

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion Financials Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion Financials Training covers a complete curriculum including General Ledger (GL), Accounts Payables (AP), Accounts Receivables (AR), Fixed Assets (FA) and Cash Management (CM). Please refer to our syllabus for detailed module information.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Training sessions are held Monday to Saturday, with each session lasting 1 hour. This ensures consistent, interactive, and structured learning.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend batches. Training is conducted live from Monday to Saturday to maintain learning continuity.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, recorded sessions are available for learners who prefer self-paced study. Please note that live doubt clarification is not included in the self-paced plan.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internship opportunities are available based on your performance in mock evaluations, helping you gain hands-on experience in Oracle Fusion Financials.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Financials Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, our Financials course is structured as a comprehensive program. We do not offer modules separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we help you build a strong resume tailored for Financials roles. Our experts offer guidance on crafting an ATS-compliant and impactful resume.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a laptop or desktop is necessary to access the Oracle Financials instance and complete practical exercises effectively.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites or Minimum Qualifications?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. Basic knowledge of accounting or finance is beneficial, but the course is open to graduates from any background (Degree, PG, B.Com, MBA, etc.).

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes, the course begins with fundamentals and moves to advanced concepts—ideal for both freshers and working professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer job assistance through mock interviews, resume support, and career guidance. We also have placement partnerships with firms such as Tech Mahindra, LTI, Evosys, FIS Global, and others.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Support for Oracle Certification?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide you through the certification process with expert tips and access to relevant sample questions and dumps.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, session recordings (1-year access) and downloadable study materials (lifetime access via Google Drive) are provided, including screenshots and navigation guides.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we share the latest module-wise interview questions and help with preparation through mock interview sessions.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance or Application Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, 6-month instance access is included. No software installation is needed—just a browser and internet connection.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, enrollment comes with a 1-year membership, allowing you to attend multiple live batches during that period.

faqs.question: Will I Receive a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will receive a certificate upon successfully completing the Oracle Fusion Financials training.

faqs.question: Is Any Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No coding is needed. This is a completely functional course designed for finance and accounting professionals.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, one-on-one sessions are available on request. Custom pricing applies for personalized training.
